meanings.definition: relating to marriage or a spouse
meanings.sent1: The couple exchanged sponsal vows during the beautiful ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The sponsal bond between husband and wife is strong and enduring.
meanings.sent3: Their sponsal commitment was evident in the way they supported each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent4: The sponsal connection between them seemed to transcend mere words.
meanings.sent5: The sponsal love they shared was evident in every glance and touch.

meanings.sent1: The entire town gathered to celebrate the sponsal of the young couple.
meanings.sent2: The sponsal was a joyous occasion filled with laughter and love.
meanings.sent3: The sponsal festivities lasted late into the night, with music and dancing.
meanings.sent4: The grandeur of the sponsal left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful decorations added a touch of magic to the sponsal venue.
